items.name: app_name
items.desc: The name of the application is used for

items.name: site_title
items.desc: The site's title as it will appear in the title bar of your browser

items.name: client_name
items.desc: The name of the client for which this project is designed. It will appear in the GDPR.

items.name: project
items.desc: The UID of the project on app-ui.com allowing you to communicate with other servers

items.name: theme
items.desc: The default theme that will have all new users (yuou can change your theme in your profile)

items.name: app_name
items.desc: The default timezone of the data in the app

items.name: sess_lifetime
items.desc: The length of time, in seconds, after which an inactive user session will be deleted

items.name: lang
items.desc: The language of the user in the app

items.name: external_user_email
items.desc: The email address used by the external user, for all actions which are not performed by a real user. This email addres will also be used as default From in the emails sent by the application

items.name: encryption_key
items.desc: The default encryption key used to store sensitive data

items.name: fingerprint
items.desc: The default fingerprint used to encode sensitive data

items.name: user
items.desc: The alternative class to replace the bbn one used otherwise

items.name: preferences
items.desc: The alternative class to replace the bbn one used otherwise

items.name: permissions
items.desc: The alternative class to replace the bbn one used otherwise

items.name: options
items.desc: The alternative class to replace the bbn one used otherwise

items.name: history
items.desc: The alternative class to replace the bbn one used otherwise

items.name: hostname
items.desc: The host name of the server where the app is installed

items.name: app_path
items.desc: The path in which the app is installed (in which the src directory is located)

items.name: public
items.desc: The root path in the URL. For example if your app is reachable at www.test.com/my_app, its value will be /myapp.

items.name: app_id
items.desc: The ID provided by app-ui.com which allow you to identify your different installations and let them communicate securely

items.name: admin_email
items.desc: The default email address to which the app will send system notifiactions

items.name: env
items.desc: The type of environment: can be dev, test, or prod

items.name: is_ssl
items.desc: Whether or not a SSL certificate is used for this app. Be careful, the certificate MUST be trusted otherwise the app won't work

items.name: db_connection
items.desc: The database connection information

items.name: database
items.desc: The database where are all the app-ui tables

items.name: lib_path
items.desc: The vendor directory (from Composer)

items.name: data_path
items.desc: The directory where the data is stored

items.name: cur_path
items.desc: The directory where the root HTML of the domain is located
